data.quote: Ridho worked with me to clean up a Figma prototype. He has a great eye for design, followed exactly what I communicated, was responsive. I was very happy with Ridho's work.
data.name: Nick A.

data.quote: Excellent work! He is a skilled designer and video editor and did a fantastic job editing our projects videos and Figma designs.
data.name: Sam Jean-Marc

data.quote: Great communication and high quality work. We gave him a very big project, and he handled it with no issues.
data.name: Pierre
